org.apache.flink.types

类 Record.InternalDeSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.types.Record.InternalDeSerializer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.DataInput, java.io.DataOutput, java.io.Serializable, DataInputView, DataOutputView
    封闭类:
    Record

    private static final class Record.InternalDeSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataInputView, DataOutputView, java.io.Serializable
    Internal interface class to provide serialization for the data types.

      • skipBytesToRead

        public void skipBytesToRead(int numBytes)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: DataInputView
        Skips numBytes bytes of memory. In contrast to the DataInput.skipBytes(int) method, this method always skips the desired number of bytes or throws an EOFException.
        指定者:
        skipBytesToRead 在接口中 DataInputView
        参数:
        numBytes - The number of bytes to skip.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if any I/O related problem occurred such that the input could not be advanced to the desired position.

      • read

        public int read(byte[] b,
                int off,
                int len)
         throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: DataInputView
        Reads up to len bytes of memory and stores it into b starting at offset off. It returns the number of read bytes or -1 if there is no more data left.
        指定者:
        read 在接口中 DataInputView
        参数:
        b - byte array to store the data to
        off - offset into byte array
        len - byte length to read
        返回:
        the number of actually read bytes of -1 if there is no more data left
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • read

        public int read(byte[] b)
         throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: DataInputView
        Tries to fill the given byte array b. Returns the actually number of read bytes or -1 if there is no more data.
        指定者:
        read 在接口中 DataInputView
        参数:
        b - byte array to store the data to
        返回:
        the number of read bytes or -1 if there is no more data left
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • skipBytesToWrite

        public void skipBytesToWrite(int numBytes)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: DataOutputView
        Skips numBytes bytes memory. If some program reads the memory that was skipped over, the results are undefined.
        指定者:
        skipBytesToWrite 在接口中 DataOutputView
        参数:
        numBytes - The number of bytes to skip.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if any I/O related problem occurred such that the view could not be advanced to the desired position.

      • write

        public void write(DataInputView source,
                  int numBytes)
           throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: DataOutputView
        Copies numBytes bytes from the source to this view.
        指定者:
        write 在接口中 DataOutputView
        参数:
        source - The source to copy the bytes from.
        numBytes - The number of bytes to copy.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if any I/O related problem occurred, such that either the input view could not be read, or the output could not be written.
